Gray has made just one first-team appearance this season, in the 2-0 Carabao Cup home defeat by Arsenal i… [+1191 chars]

articles.title: Dana White to Meet with Khabib In Hopes of UFC Return, 'I'll Bet On Me!' | TMZ Sports - TMZSports
articles.description: White says he and Khabib will sit down in January to discuss a potential return to the octagon after The Eagle's sudden retirement back in October.SUBSCRIBE ...
